bio:
💎Jewellery Insider • Curator of best jewels
💎Международный ювелирный обозреватель • Лучшие украшения мира тут ⬇️
Personal account @katerinaperezdiary

posts.caption:
[Tanzanite special] To continue my new specially dedicated series of jewellery, I want to show you these Molu @molujewellery earrings with 15.58cts tanzanites and over 5cts of diamonds. They glow with a vibrant indigo colour, which the sparkling diamonds complement in a chic way. 📷 Simon @Martner for #katerinaperezcom

#molu #molujewellery #earrings #tanzanites #tanzanite #finejewellery #highjewellery #hautejoaillerie #jewelrygram #finejewelry #instajewel #luxury #highjewelry #jeweloftheday #diamonds #instajewelry #diamondjewellery #jewellery #jewellerydesign

[Splash of colour] More colour comes courtesy of Constantin Wild @constantinwild.gems and a small part of his collection of vivid, fancy colour sapphires. I had a fascinating chat with the gemstone dealer about these beautiful gems, which you can find by following this link: http://bit.ly/2zrsU3U
WHICH SAPPHIRE COLOUR IS YOUR FAVOURITE? 📷 Simon @Martner for #katerinaperezcom

#constantinwild #gemstrustwild #gemstones #finegems #idaroberstein #gems #finegemstones #luxury #luxurious #madeingermany #perfectcut #colouredgemstones #finejewellery #highjewellery #hautejoaillerie #sapphires #colouredsapphires #fancycolouredsapphire

[Dazzling diamonds] Continuing my series focusing on diamond jewellery, this ring from the Russian jeweller Master Brilliant @masterbrilliant caught my eye because it brought to mind both a rose and a labyrinth simultaneously! The outer design is one continuous spiral which oscillates around the central diamond. 📷 @katerinaperezdiary for #katerinaperezcom

#masterbrilliant #diamondring #diamonds #diamondjewellery #diamondjewelry #luxury  #finejewellery #hautejoaillerie #highjewellery #finejewelry #jewelrygram #instajewel #highjewelry #jeweloftheday #instajewelry #jewellery #jewellerydesign

[Dazzling diamonds] My series focusing on exciting diamond jewellery continues with this ‘Brassica’ set of earrings from Neha Dani @nehadanijewels. Just look at the 3-D volume of this jewel which is paved with a stunning array of diamonds - 924 pink stones give an approximate total weight of 9.67 carats and 468 round cut diamonds weight 5.48 carats. There are also 4 old mine cut diamonds totalling 2.46 carats. This fully articulated creation is a treat for lovers of delicate, feminine diamond jewellery, all set in 18k rose gold. 📷 Simon @martner for #katerinaperezcom 📖 To read more on Neha Dani’s jewellery creations, follow this (case sensitive) link: bit.ly/2I0ND5K

#nehadani #nehadanijewellery #brassica #pinkdiamonds #diamondearrings #rosecut #rosecutdiamonds #luxury #luxuryjewellery #diamondjewellery #hautejoaillerie #highjewelry #finejewellery #earrings #redcarpetjewellery

[Tanzanite special] India-based designer H Ajoomal @h.ajoomal has created these 'Modern Vintage' earrings, which feature a central faceted oval tanzanite and rose cut pear shaped diamonds, with a border of tanzanite melée. In this design, you can see the influences of Indian jewellery in the gem cuts, romantic antique pieces in the motifs and colour combinations, and modern influences in both the more refined form and the choice of tanzanite. 📷 Simon @Martner for #katerinaperezcom

#hajoomal #tanzanite #earrings #rosecut #diamonds #diamondjewellery
#finejewellery #jewelrygram #luxury #instajewel #hautejoaillerie #earrings #highjewellery #finejewelry #highjewelry #jeweloftheday #instajewelry #uniquejewellery #jewellery

[Dazzling diamonds] Please, ‘meet’ something extraordinary - ‘The Eye of Golconda’ pendant necklace that features a 40.05-carat pear-shaped diamond and a 6.76-carat cushion-shaped diamond, both graded by the Gemological Institute of America as D color with internally flawless clarity.
Golconda diamonds are often described as “Diamonds of First Water,” according to Christie’s @Christ iesjewels because they are characterized by “an almost indefinable water-clear appearance that attest to their diaphanous quality and a degree of transparency rarely seen in stones from other localities.” Some of the most famous diamonds in the world are believed to have come from mines in the Golconda region of India including the Koh-i-noor, Darya-e Nur, the Nur-Ul-Ain, and The Hope Diamond.
#golconda #golcondadiamond #theeyeofgolconda #diamonds #oldminediamond #diamondpendant #investmentjewellery #christies #uniquegemstone #gemstone #diamond #бриллиант #голкондабриллиант #колье #ожерелье #бриллиантовоеожерелье

[Dazzling diamonds] 💕 Can you imagine a more sweet and charming choker? From Tabbah @maisontabbah - this necklace is decorated with a removable fancy heart cut diamond. Carré cut pink sapphires and colourless diamonds alternate around the neck to create an irreverent, girlish look. This jewellery ensemble is finished with a toi et moi diamond ring 💕 Both pieces are based on the theme of love! 📷 Simon @martner for #katerinaperezcom

#tabbah #maisontabbah #toietmoi #diamondring #engagementring #heartcutdiamond #diamondchoker #choker #chokernecklace #tabbahjewellery #diamondnecklace #diamondheart #pinksapphires #uniquenjewellery #diamondjewelry #luxury #diamonds

[Dazzling diamonds] This spectacular diamond ring is from the ‘Dior Dior Dior’ collection introduced during Paris Haute Couture week this year; the @Dior ‘Dentelle Organza’ ring with a 5.07ct shield / bullet cut diamond, pink sapphires and accenting diamonds is simultaneously an unusual, modern and yet gracefully feminine design. 📖 To read more on fancy diamond cuts, follow this (case sensitive) link: http://bit.ly/ParisDiamonds

#dior #diamond #ring #diorring #diamondring #shieldcut #unsualdiamondcut #uniquediamondjewellery #diorjewellery #luxury #parishautecouture #hautejoaillerie #diamondjewellery #finejewelry

[Splash of colour] This astonishing gemstone layout has been curated by Paul Wild @paulwildgems - all of these are Paraiba tourmalines from Mozambique, even the bright purple gems! Imagine being the lucky owner of the jewellery which these gems will become! 📷 Simon @Martner for #katerinaperezcom

#paulwild #paulwildgems #paulwildgemstones #paraibatourmaline #gemstones #paraiba #necklace #paraibajewellery #finejewellery #highjewellery #jewelrygram #instajewel #jewellerydesign

[Dazzling diamonds] Jessica Fong @jessicafongartistryjewellery combines a whole host of diamonds to create this stunning butterfly brooch in 18 karat white gold. Colourless diamonds are the perfect choice to balance the audacious size of this jewel! 📷 Simon @Martner for #katerinaperezcom

#jessicafong #diamonds #diamondjewellery #diamondjewelry #luxury #redcarpetjewellery #butterfly #butterflyjewellery #jewelry #jewellery #brooch #diamondbrooch #butterflybrooch #finejewellery #hautejoaillerie #highjewellery #finejewelry #jewelrygram #instajewel #jeweloftheday

[Dazzling Diamonds] Today I am starting my series of diamond jewellery with this Michelle Ong @carnetjewellery_bymichelleong masterpiece necklace. It features an impressive variety of diamond cuts including round and pear-shaped rose cuts that have this alluring sparkle.
📷 Photo credit: Simon Martner for #katerinaperezcom
#necklace #diamonds #diamondnecklace #diamondjewellery #rosecutdiamonds #diamonds #бриллиантовоеколье #бриллианты #michelleong #carnetjewellery

[Tanzanite special] Feng J. @feng.j_haute_joaillerie showcases the beauty of tanzanite in this 'Tuileries Garden' brooch/pendant, in 18k white and yellow gold with 14.50ct tanzanite, yellow diamonds, sapphires, fancy coloured sapphires, and colourless diamonds. Can you spot the 🦋 butterfly 🦋 ?

#tanzanite #fengj #fengjhautejoaillerie #brooch #pendant #yellowdiamonds #sapphires
#finejewellery #highjewellery #hautejoaillerie #jewelrygram #finejewelry #instajewel #luxury #highjewelry #jeweloftheday #diamonds #instajewelry #diamondjewellery #jewellery #artjewellery #брошь #танзанит

[Dazzling diamonds] Here I want to show you something truly special - a parure by Kamyen @kamyenjewellery that features Golconda old mine diamonds, weighing a combined total of approximately 150 carats. Even in the photo they have this insane sparkle typical for the diamonds mined in this region many years ago. 📖 To read more on Kamyen jewellery, follow this link: http://bit.ly/Kamyen 📷 Simon @Martner for #katerinaperezcom

#kamyen #golconda #golcondadiamonds #oldminecut #oldminecutdiamonds #parure #diamondparure #diamonds #diamondjewellery #diamondjewelry #luxury #redcarpetjewellery #kamyenjewellery #diamondnecklace #privatejeweller

[Dazzling diamonds] I am a big fan of imperfections - because I see them as a peculiar type of beauty that makes everyone and everything unique. Take these diamonds from Kunming @kunmingdiamonds for example. I think their grey and brownish colour, as well as tiny inclusions in the round diamond, can be interpreted as a great design feature, making the future jewel truly unique. 📷 Photo credit: Simon @martner for #katerinaperezcom

#kunmingdiamonds #browndiamond #greydiamond #uniquediamond #loosediamonds #luxury #diamonds #diamondjewellery #diamond #diamondring #heartcutdiamond #heartshapeddiamond #pearcutdiamond

[Dazzling diamonds] The other day I visited the newly opened Yeprem @yeprem salon within the first floor Fine Jewellery room of @Harrods to try on a selection of their beautiful diamond jewellery. These ‘Moonyte’ earrings and ‘Chevalier’ ring. The earrings feature a total of 11.34ct marquise diamonds and 6.33ct round brilliant diamonds, and the ring is bedecked with 1.56ct brilliant diamonds and 2.14ct of marquise cuts. 📷 @katerinaperezdiary for #katerinaperezcom

#yeprem #harrods #diamondjewelry #yepremjewellery #diamondring #diamonds #diamondjewellery #diamond #harrods #jewelleryboutique #luxury #instajewel #jewelrygram

[Dazzling Diamonds] With this next ring I want to present something special to you - it is not a colourless diamond but a white one in the centre, that is rare to find in fine jewellery. This audacious jewel was created by the Greek designer, Theodoros @theodoros_jeweler - who loved unconventional beauty when it comes to gems. The colour of the central stone that some might find ‘imperfect’ didn’t put him off, quite the opposite, the unusual stone got the imagination of the designer going, and in the end this unique ring was born.

#whitediamond #greekdesigner #theodoros #finejewellery #katerinaperezcom #hautejoaillerie #highjewellery #finejewelry #jewelrygram #instajewel #highjewelry #jeweloftheday #instajewelry #diamondjewellery #diamonds #uniquejewellery #jewellerydesign

[Dazzling diamonds] Stenzhorn's @stenzhorn 'Second Skin' choker and rings are designed in a special way making them flexible and supple. The diamonds seem to follow the curves of the body creating an impression of soft (and so precious) fabric. I love this stenzhorn’s take on contemporary take on high jewellery. 📷 Simon @Martner for #katerinaperezcom

#diamonds #diamondjewellery #diamondjewelry #luxury #redcarpetjewellery #stenzhorn #stenzhornjewellery #diamondchoker #choker #chokernecklace #diamondnecklace #hautejoaillerie #highjewellery #finejewelry #jewelrygram #finejewellery #diamondchocker #secondskin

[Dazzling diamonds] This necklace and earring set by William Goldberg @williamgoldbergdiamonds features the brand's signature Ashoka cut diamonds. Ashoka diamonds are a patent of William Goldberg, and are elongated rectangular cuts with rounded corners. They contain 62 facets rather than the 57 found in the standard brilliant cut diamond. This cut requires clean, long diamond rough, and less than 1 in 5 stones make the cut! 📷 Simon @Martner for #katerinaperezcom
#ashoka #diamonds #williamgoldberg #finejewellery #highjewellery #diamonds #hautejoaillerie #luxury #diamondnecklace #yellowdiamonds #fancyyellowdiamonds #yellowdiamondjewellery

location.location_name: GemGenève - Geneva International Gem & Jewellery Show

posts.caption:
[Dazzling diamonds] I just have to feature this intricate Alanina @alaninajewelry cuff bracelet from ‘Neo-Couture’ Collection. Called ‘Estrela’, it is made in rose gold with 4.81 carats of GIA certified diamonds: 0.56 carats, Imperial topaz and morganites.
#alaninajewelry #cuffbracelet #cuff #diamondcuff #diamonds #couturejewellery #finejewelry #jeweloftheday #instajewel #bladesetting #jewelry #jewellery

[Dazzling Diamonds] We are all used to the traditional cuts like brilliant, pear, or princess. How about something unique, like this stone from A J Mehta @ajmehtaco that weighs an impressive 10 carats? How would you describe this shape? 📷 Photo by Simon @martner for #katerinaperezcom

#gemstone #diamond #10cts #bigdiamond #бриллиант #fancycutdiamond #sparkle #bling #uniquegem #ajmehta #diamonds #diamondjewellery #instajewel #jeweloftheday

[Dazzling diamonds] Vishal Kothari from VAK fine jewellery @v.a.kfinejewels is a big fan of rose cut diamonds. In these earrings and the ring the mixture of cuts and the lack of visibility of the settings creates a distinctive signature style. 📷 Simon @Martner for #katerinaperezcom

#vakfinejewellery #vakjewellery #rosecutdiamonds #unusualdiamondcuts #finejewellery #hautejoaillerie #highjewellery #finejewelry #jewelrygram #instajewel #luxury #highjewelry #jeweloftheday #diamonds #instajewelry #diamondjewellery #jewellery #jewellerydesign

[Tanzanite special] Do you remember this Cartier @cartier bracelet from the Cartier Royal High jewellery collection launched in 2014. It features a beautiful 79.52 carat cabochon cut cushion-shaped tanzanite accented by rock crystal and onyx, as well as baguette-cut, triangular-shaped and brilliant-cut diamonds.

#cartier #cartierbracelet #tanzanite #finejewellery #katerinaperezcom #hautejoaillerie #highjewellery #jewelrygram #finejewelry #instajewel #luxury #highjewelry #jeweloftheday #diamonds #instajewelry #uniquejewellery #bracelet

location.location_name: Harrods London, 87-135 Brompton Road , London-United Kingdom

posts.caption:
[Tanzanite special] A wonderful example of a tanzanite stone in fine jewellery design is this Piaget @piaget 'Blue Emotion' manchette from the 'Sunlight Escape' collection. The delicate feather marquetry by the French artist Nelly Saunier @nellysaunier is offset by the step cut facets of the 24.36 cts tanzanite. Over 600 diamonds were used to embellish the cuff.

#tanzanite #tanzanitespecial #marquetry #feathers #manchette #cuff #manchettecuff #piaget #finejewellery #katerinaperezcom #hautejoaillerie #highjewellery #jewelrygram #finejewelry #luxury #instajewel #highjewelry #jeweloftheday #instajewelry #diamonds #diamondjewellery #tanzanitejewellery #танзанит #браслет #драгоценности #ювелирныеукрашения

[Dazzling diamonds] Mixed cut diamonds in fine jewellery designs have been a huge trend this year, and this cuff from @neillanejewelry Neil Lane combines brilliant cut, emerald cut and baguette cut diamonds into one design.
The American jeweller uses this variation alongside design motifs like frills and linear shapes to create texture and intrigue in this piece.
#neillane #neillanejewellery #cuff #diamondcuff
#sparkle #bling #uniquegem #diamonds #diamondjewellery #instajewel #jeweloftheday #finejewellery #hautejoaillerie #highjewellery #finejewelry #jewelrygram #highjewelry #instajewelry #jewellerydesign
